title: Im so Fucking done right now
body: My client crashes cause of fps lag and freezes when all my settings are on low, I reset my computer and try and get back to the game as fast as possible since its a ranked, I  come back in around 5-9 minutes of so ( not the best pc) no warnings or anything saying ill get any consistences so im ok, the game finishes we lose sadly, and here pops up a message im all to familiar with You have been placed in a low priority que for 5 games, I get to wait 20 minutes before i even get into que and its fking bullshit if this is going to happen every time what's the point in getting back to a game which you are most likely to lose even if you still get this shit. I have been playing since season 1 and played ranked in season 2 hence my cup and this new leaver buster is fked go back to the old riot, people do not leave games any more to piss someone off (Not as often) but most of the time its the clients fault or the computer at hand which people can not control (Sadly im one of those people with a bad pc)  and this happens to me about 1 time a week so every week i have to wait 120 miniutes in total before i can even get into que which equals to about 3 games, so your wasting my time because of a stupid system you havnt refined. If anyone else is getting this problem please post below and try to attract riots attention,

replies.body: sthap spamming, also srsly riot why you spamming me low priority when I get a 3 min dc because the game crashes, not cool {{champion:32}}
